transform.tRule: ######################################################################## # # Preemptive gemination for the Encylopedia Aethiopica Transliteration system. # # This transformation applies the Ethiopic-to-Ethiopic gemination mappings prior to # performing the regular Ethiopic-to-IES/JES 1964-Latin transform. These mappings # are supported in the forward direction (Ethiopic-to-Latin) only at this time. # # Documentation for these transforms are given in the am-Ethi-t-am-ethi-m0-geminate.xml # and und-Ethi-t-und-latn-m0-ies-jes-1964-geminate.xml files respectively. # ######################################################################## # :: Amharic-Amharic/Geminate ; :: Ethiopic-Latin/IES_JES_1964 ; # ########################################################################
